## BundleBuilder.createFromPredefined() method

Creates a resource bundle from a ResourceManagerBuilder using a predefined system configuration. This is a convenience method for the common case of using predefined configurations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static createFromPredefined(builder: ResourceManagerBuilder, configName: PredefinedSystemConfiguration, params?: IBundleCreateParams): Result<IBundle>;
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

The name of the predefined system configuration used


</td></tr>

params

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IBundle](./ts-res.bundle.ibundle.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Success with the created bundle if successful, Failure with error message otherwise
